gr: Ohne das vielfach befuerchtete Chaos haben die Computeranlagen in aller Welt den Uebergang ins Jahr 2000 gemeistert
en: Computers throughout the world mastered the transition into the Year 2000 without the predicted chaos that had many worried

gr: Es kam zwar vereinzelt zu kleineren Stoerungen , rund um den Globus blieben aber die Lichter an , Flugzeuge landeten sicher und die Wasserversorgung arbeitete normal
en: There were a few small individual disruptions , but for the most part the lights stayed on , planes landed safely and the water supplies worked normally throughout the world

gr: In Deutschland habe es keine relevanten Ausfaelle von Computersystemen gegeben , hiess es aus dem Berliner Lagezentrums des Bundesinnenministeriums
en: According to the Federal Ministry of the Interior 's regional center in Berlin , there were no major computer system failures in Germany

gr: Die Experten wehren sich aber gegen den Eindruck , dass die moeglichen Probleme vorher uebertrieben worden seien
en: However , experts are defending themselves against the impression that the many problems that had been predicted were blown out of proportion

gr: Tatsaechlich vorhandene Schwachstellen seien durch Testlaeufe gefunden und beseitigt worden
en: They insist that all of the weak spots had been found during test runs and had been corrected
